environment_variables.slave: The name of the build host (daint, kesch, ...)
environment_variables.BUILD_NUMBER: The current build number, such as "153"
environment_variables.BUILD_ID: The current build id, such as "2005-08-22_23-59-59" (YYYY-MM-DD_hh-mm-ss)
environment_variables.BUILD_DISPLAY_NAME: The display name of the current build, something like "#153" by default
environment_variables.NODE_LABELS: Whitespace-separated list of labels that the node is assigned
environment_variables.JENKINS_HOME: The absolute path of the data storage directory assigned on the master node
environment_variables.JENKINS_URL: Full URL of Jenkins, like http://server:port/jenkins/
environment_variables.BUILD_URL: Full URL of this build, like http://server:port/jenkins/job/foo/15/
environment_variables.JOB_URL: Full URL of this job, like http://server:port/jenkins/job/foo/
environment_variables.input_backend: GTC backend name fix: passed as gtc_gt_* but their real name are gtc:gt:* OR gtc_* but their real name is gtc:*
environment_variables.action: The action to be performed, e.g. run_regression_tests
environment_variables.backend: The backend to be used, e.g. gtc:gt:c384
environment_variables.experiment: The experiment to be run, e.g. fv3core_a_test
environment_variables.envloc: The location of the environment directory
environment_variables.python_env: The Python environment to be used, e.g. virtualenv
environment_variables.jenkins_dir: The root directory of where jenkins.sh is sitting
environment_variables.GT4PY_VERSION: The version of the GT4PY library
environment_variables.scheduler: The scheduler to be used, e.g. slurm
environment_variables.scheduler_script: The path to the scheduler script
environment_variables.NUM_RANKS: The number of ranks to be used
environment_variables.CRAY_CUDA_MPS: Whether to enable Cray Multi-Process Services
environment_variables.DATA_VERSION: The version of the test data
environment_variables.SCRATCH: The location of the scratch directory
environment_variables.TEST_DATA_DIR: The location of the test data directory
environment_variables.FV3_STENCIL_REBUILD_FLAG: Whether to rebuild the FV3 stencil
environment_variables.TEST_DATA_HOST: The location of the test data on the host
environment_variables.JENKINS_TAG: The tag for the Jenkins job
environment_variables.FV3CORE_INSTALL_FLAGS: The flags to be used when installing FV3Core
environment_variables.FV3_PATH: The path to the FV3 directory
environment_variables.TEST_DATA_RUN_LOC: The location of the test data on the run machine
environment_variables.G2G: Whether to run the job on the G2G cluster
environment_variables.MPIRUN_CALL: The command to use for running MPI jobs
